attributes.title: Black Isle Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Started brewing in December 1998 in converted farm buildings.  Ales include Red Kite and Yellowhammer.  Organic ales are a speciality.
